column4: you know that water effect you get buy pressing ctrl+alt+special and moving the mouse? How can you make that always on?
you didnt read carefully then works for all sorts of situations not just dvds
try to disable some of the plugins for compiz to find the one that is causing the issue
which plugins were you chiefly using
when did this start messing up? an update, installing some new software or what
well perhaps try to enable the plugins one by one until you find the culprit
try creating a new user first
please dont use the enter key as punctuation
/msg ubottu for fun if you wish
